FOLIOCC.description: unique subject identifier, alternative to PROYECTO + FOLIO

F_qualitycheck.description: quality controlled urinary fluoride samples measured on adolescent urine during cholesterol visit (“V0”)

RSD.description: Samples were (for the majority of cases) measured in duplicate, thus an RSD value could be obtained.

specific_gravity.description: SG value was measured when mercury was measured

SG.adjusted.fluoride.description: The formula for adjustment is: SG.adjusted.fluoride = F_qualitycheck * (1.020-1) / (specific_gravity-1); where 1.020 is the median of specific gravity.
